key_risks: Regulatory risks due to evolving energy policies in Europe
Intense competition from traditional and new energy providers
Challenges in transitioning from fossil fuels to renewables
Rising energy prices affecting customer retention
Environmental scrutiny due to historical reliance on fossil fuels
controversies: Criticism from environmental groups over historical fossil fuel reliance
Consumer backlash due to rising energy prices
environmental_issues: Ongoing environmental scrutiny despite sustainability efforts
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction due to rising energy prices
Potential impact on brand reputation from consumer criticism
governance_issues: Financial performance volatility due to restructuring charges
